property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Pakistani and U.S. service members conducting an HA mission

note.text: U.S. service members have reported that their Pakistani counterparts take a more hands-off role during HA missions.
When working with the Pakistan military, make sure your counterparts are participating in the mission and contributing to its success. Collaborative projects should be reciprocal and equal.

Because Pakistanis are often mistrustful of U.S. motives for giving aid, the Pakistan military should be perceived as the one leading the projects. Putting Pakistani counterparts in charge will improve local perceptions of missions.
